column5: Does anyone know of a fishing lodge that is on McPherson Island in Canada on Lake of the Woods. I am looking for a lodge that is near this area or somewhere in the general vicinity. Thanks for any input.

Looking There aren't any lodges or camps on McPherson Island itself, however, there are two very close to the island. On the north side of the island, maybe three hundred yards away, is Spruce Island Camp. www.spruceislandcamp.com At the south entrance to Sabaskosing Bay (south edge of McPherson Island) is Bell Island Outpost. www.bellislandoutpost.com Marv

WENT TO MCPHERSON ISLAND IN 2000. AT THAT TIME IT WAS AN OUTPOST OF GARY ALLEN'S ( ALLEN'S CROW LAKE LODGE) WE HAD PRETTY TOUGH FISHING BUYT I DID GET A 52" MUSKEY...LOTW IS A REALLY BIG PLACE AND WE STAYED FAIRLY CLOSE TO THE CABIN .....HAD A GREAT TIME AND GOT THE "FISH OF MY LIFETIME"

Hi! I am the person you want to talk to about that place. We bought it from gary in 2001 and have rebuilt the place. e-mail me at [email protected] or check the site at www.bellislandoutpost.ca bye for now Randy
